definition: to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)

sentences.english: He obtained, however, the recognition and approbation of the congregation of Albi.
sentences.chinese: 他得到了，但是，承认和赞许的会众的阿尔比。

sentences.english: Mr. Shi applauds the government's hard work.
sentences.chinese: 石先生赞许政府的艰苦工作。

sentences.english: Still, I just HAD TO give a thumbs up to any mention of Ralph Kramden.
sentences.chinese: 不过我还是要对你提到拉尔夫表示赞许。

sentences.english: I anticipate nothing but grateful approbation .
sentences.chinese: 我预料大家只有感激赞许。

sentences.english: And their respect and praise gives you the ideal dose of self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 他们对你的欣赏和赞许是使你获得自信的一剂良药。

sentences.english: I'm here to applaud them in their efforts to market to real women.
sentences.chinese: 我在这儿赞许他们在推销真女人上所做出的努力。

sentences.english: He gives you a thumbs up, slurps his coffee, and walks away.
sentences.chinese: 他对您表示赞许，并啜着咖啡满意地走开了。

sentences.english: Garrosh accepts the compliment with some skepticism.
sentences.chinese: 伽罗什带着些许怀疑接受了这些赞许。

sentences.english: Stop pandering to other people's approval and start developing your own standards.
sentences.chinese: 停止迎合别人的赞许，开始培养自己的标准。

sentences.english: And shall secure to you the peace, friendship, and approbation of all nations.
sentences.chinese: 为你们保证和平，友谊，和所有国家的赞许。

sentences.english: Just this little approval set Carrie's heart bounding.
sentences.chinese: 就这么一个小小的赞许，弄得嘉莉心头怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: Mom decided to take him to the sea. Duringthe trip!
sentences.chinese: 为了对儿子的前进表示赞许，她带他去看了一次大海。

sentences.english: If you want a better relationship with anyone "Stroking" is mandatory.
sentences.chinese: 如果你希望和某人更好地相处，“赞许”是必须的。

sentences.english: His works won the enthusiastic approval of his readers.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品受到读者的赞许。

sentences.english: The manager surveyed her report with approbation.
sentences.chinese: 经理赞许地审读她的报告。

definition: to praise/to approve of/to show approval
to praise/to speak highly of/to commend
to admire/to look up to/to respect sb greatly
